overview_title: Overview of the EU AI Act
overview_description: The European Union's Artificial Intelligence Act is the world's first comprehensive legal framework for AI, aiming to promote trustworthy AI while protecting fundamental rights.
key_provisions_description: Learn about the risk-based approach, prohibited practices, and requirements for high-risk AI systems.
compliance_description: Understand what your organization needs to do to comply with the EU AI Act.
resources_description: Access tools, checklists, and official documentation to help navigate the regulatory landscape.
risk_assessment_description: Use this interactive tool to assess the risk level of your AI system according to the EU AI Act.
risk_unacceptable_description: AI systems that pose a clear threat to safety, livelihoods, and rights of people.
risk_high_description: AI systems that could harm health, safety, or fundamental rights.
risk_limited_description: AI systems with specific transparency obligations.
risk_minimal_description: All other AI systems that can be developed and used freely.
doc_official_text_description: Access the complete legal text of the EU AI Act.
doc_compliance_checklist_description: Step-by-step guide to ensure your organization is compliant with the EU AI Act.
doc_timeline_description: Key dates and deadlines for the implementation of the EU AI Act.
doc_templates_description: Templates for the technical documentation required for high-risk AI systems.
timeline_item_1_title: EU AI Act Enters Into Force
timeline_item_1_description: The regulation officially becomes law across the European Union on August 1, 2024.
timeline_item_2_description: The first set of prohibitions on AI systems comes into effect on February 2, 2025.
timeline_item_3_description: The EU AI Office will be established to oversee implementation.
timeline_item_4_description: Most provisions of the EU AI Act become fully applicable on August 2, 2026.
contribute_title: Contribute to the EU AI Act Guide
contribute_description: Help improve this resource by contributing your expertise, translations, or technical skills.
contribute_code_description: Help improve the website's functionality, accessibility, and user experience.
contribute_content_description: Help ensure the information about the EU AI Act is accurate, comprehensive, and up-to-date.
contribute_translation_description: Help make the EU AI Act Guide accessible in more languages.
contribute_documentation_description: Help improve project documentation and guides.
